mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM users u WHERE account = #{username};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onlineorg (orgid, AreaID, orgname,ApproveState) VALUES (#{orgid},#{areaID},#{orgname},#{approveState});
INSERT INTO users ( UserID, account, PASSWORD, UserBelongTo, UsertypeID, isFirstEnroll ) VALUES (#{userID},#{username}, #{password}, #{userBelongTo},#{usertypeID},#{isFirstEnroll});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users u WHERE account = #{username} and password=#{password};
SELECT ut.UserTypeName FROM users u INNER JOIN usertype ut ON u.UserTypeID = ut.UserTypeID WHERE u.UserTypeID = #{userTypeID};
SELECT max(CONVERT (RIGHT(o.orgid, 6), SIGNED)) maxorgid FROM onlineorg o WHERE LEFT (o.orgid, 6) = #{areaID};

SELECT ut.UserBelongTo userBelongTo, ut.UserTypeName userTypeName, u.UserTypeID usertype, u.account account, u.RealName realName, u.orgid orgid, u.MaintenanceId maintenanceId, u.ManagerOrgID managerOrgID FROM users u INNER JOIN usertype ut ON u.UserTypeID = ut.UserTypeID WHERE account = #{username}
SELECT m2.ModuleID, m2.ModuleName, m2.URL, m2.OrderNum, m2.ParentID, m2.levelnum, m2.pic FROM modulelist m1 INNER JOIN modulelist m2 ON m1.ModuleID = m2.ParentID WHERE m1.ModuleID = #{moduleID}

SELECT m1.ModuleID ModuleID, m1.ModuleName ModuleName, m1.URL URL, m1.OrderNum OrderNum, m1.ParentID ParentID, m1.levelnum levelnum, m1.pic pic FROM users u INNER JOIN usertype ut ON u.UserTypeID = ut.UserTypeID INNER JOIN module_usertype mt ON ut.UserTypeID = mt.UserTypeID INNER JOIN modulelist m1 ON mt.ModuleID = m1.ModuleID WHERE account = #{username}
SELECT orgname FROM onlineorg WHERE orgid = #{orgID}
SELECT UnitName FROM maintenance WHERE MaintenanceId = #{maintenanceId}
SELECT ManagerOrgName FROM managerorg WHERE ManagerOrgID =#{managerOrgID}
